thread.title: Lena Dunham Blames Trump for Her Weight Loss
thread.title_full: Lena Dunham Blames Trump for Her Weight Loss

title: Lena Dunham Blames Trump for Her Weight Loss
text: Lena Dunham Blames Trump for Her Weight Loss Getty Feb 7, 2017 Yesterday, Lena Dunham visited Howard Stern's SiriusXM radio show to promote the final season of Girls . During the interview, Entertainment Weekly reports , the host complimented Dunham's figure, which prompted the actress to explain the source of her recent weight loss: "Donald Trump became president and I stopped being able to eat food. Everyone's been asking like, 'What have you been doing?'' And I'm like, 'Try soul-crushing pain and devastation and hopelessness and you, too, will lose weight,'" she said. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below But, of course, the stress-induced Trump Diet, which sounds a whole lot like the Breakup Diet , isn't a healthy look, because it means your body is shutting down. Great! Stern also asked Dunham if she thought Trump―who called her "a B-list actor with no mojo"―spending so much time paying attention to celebrities was a mistake. "Here's the funny thing. Of course, it's a mistake, but we're talking about him like he's a person who is operating in a sane way, we're talking about him like a person who doesn't have a personality disorder," she said. Lena Dunham at the New York premiere of the sixth season of 'Girls' on February 2, 2017. Getty
